articles.author: PTI
articles.title: South Africa batter Zubayr Hamza suspended by ICC for doping violation
articles.description: The ICC on Tuesday suspended South African batter Zubayr Hamza from all cricket-related activities for a period of nine months after he admitted to an anti-doping rule violation under the apex body's anti-doping code.
articles.content: South Africa batter Zubayr Hamza suspended by ICC for doping violation

articles.author: Akshay Kaushal
articles.title: Hina vs Bhumi: Who wore corset better?
articles.description: When we saw Hina Khan's corset look recently, we realised this was the same outfit Bhumi wore last year in  November.  Who do you think wore it better?
articles.content: Bhumi is surely multitalented. She doesn't need a hairstylist to fix her hair or a makeup person to make her look flawless, she does both on her own and the result is phenomenal.

articles.description: Though there is no concrete definition of what comprises electronic transmission, WTO members have generally agreed that anything from software to email, digital text messages, music videos, songs, and video games fall under the ambit of this term.

articles.author: Mirror Now
articles.title: Rakesh Jhunjhunwala-backed Akasa Air get its airline code QP
articles.description: Akasa Air, which is planning to start its commercial flight operations in July, on Tuesday said its airline code will be 'QP'. Every airline in the world has a designator code. For example, IndiGo's code is '6E', Go First's is 'G8' and Air India's is 'AI'.
